description:
Exciting Opportunities with Canterbury English Teaching Academy in Madrid

Are you considering taking a break after college, exploring new career paths, or seeking a vibrant international experience in Spain? Canterbury English Teaching Academy provides one-year Madrid Lifestyle & TEFL Programs tailored for individuals from various backgrounds and aspirations.

Are You the Right Fit?

  • Recent College Graduates looking to gain valuable experience before further studies or corporate roles.
  • Those tired of the corporate world and eager to embark on a new journey.
  • Existing English teachers interested in enhancing their skills with or without TEFL or CELTA certification.
  • Individuals dreaming of becoming ESL teachers from a young age.
  • Retired or semi-retired individuals seeking a fresh challenge in life.
  • Economic independent individuals yearning to immerse themselves in the Spanish lifestyle.

Why Choose Madrid?

  • Madrid offers a dynamic setting with a reasonable cost of living and modern transportation facilities.
  • Experience a melting pot of cultures and people along with a vibrant nightlife scene.
  • Immerse yourself in rich history, tradition, and stunning architecture while residing in one of the safest capitals globally.

Discover the Canterbury English Advantage

Since 1991, Canterbury English has empowered over 7,500 English speakers to teach in Spain while relishing the excitement of living abroad. Our commitment is to inspire individuals to create a fulfilling life beyond just earning a living.

Our Programs Offer

  • One-year Student Visa for non-EU members enabling work opportunities for up to 30 hours per week.
  • Instituto Cervantes accredited Spanish language programs.
  • Affordable tuition fees for both Madrid Lifestyle and TEFL Programs.
  • Comprehensive support including job placements, social activities, and an instant community of expats.

Unlock Your Path to Success

  • Engage in a 120-hour TEFL course to kickstart your teaching journey.
  • Enjoy a ten-month Spanish program to meet student visa requirements.
  • Access job placements with Canterbury English and partner academies.
  • Embark on cultural and social adventures through weekend activities.

Join Us Today

Seize the opportunity to live and work in Spain, ranked among the top cities globally for an exceptional quality of life. Become a part of the Canterbury English ex-pat family and make your Spanish dreams a reality!

Employment Type: Full-Time
